profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2021-04-06 01:14:53 -0400.

repository.corpname: Digital Collections and Archives, Tufts University

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection is organized into one series: Minutes.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection contains meeting minutes from the Reading Room Association.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: The Reading Room Association was a student-sponsored group organized in 1859, which subscribed to a dozen or so daily and weekly papers and magazines and donated its dog-eared back copies to the library after their immediate purpose had been served.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: This collection is open for research.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Some material in this collection may be protected by copyright and other rights. Please see "Reproductions and Use" on the Digital Collections and Archives website for more information about reproductions and permission to publish. No documentation is available regarding the intellectual property rights in this collection.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Steven Gentry, Archives and Reference Assistant, processed this collection at the folder-level in January, 2017 under the direction of Adrienne Pruitt, Collections Management Archivist.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Reading Room Association Records, 1905-1916. Tufts University. Digital Collections and Archives. Medford, MA.

controlaccess.subject: Student life
Student Activities -- Student Government, Clubs, and Organizations

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: This series is open for research.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This series consists of one bound volume of meeting minutes from the Reading Room Association.
